skills.skill: Core Microsoft Technologies (Azure, Active Directory, O365)
Hardware and Software Installation and Maintenance

duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation, configuration, and maintenance of information technology infrastructure including servers, SAN, network switches, storage, and software.
Assessment of system performance, capacity planning, growth projections, and software installations and upgrades.
Maintenance of 24/7/365 continuous up-time, including overtime, holidays, and weekends as required.
Creation and maintenance of server and systems documentation.
Assistance in the design, architecture, deployment, configuration, and training of new systems.
Proficiency maintenance within the IT industry through certifications, self-study, conferences, and seminars.

education_certification.credential: High School graduate or GED equivalent is required. Bachelor’s degree in Business, Management, or related field is preferred.
